contents.name: diameter
contents.comment: diameter at center of the tank in centimeters

contents.name: volume
contents.comment: maximum volume of the tank in liters

contents.name: lat
contents.comment: latitude of the place where item is located (can be used as offset y from the center aka x,y,z=0,0,0)

contents.name: long
contents.comment: longitude of the place where item is located (can be used as offset x from the center aka x,y,z=0,0,0)

contents.name: elevation
contents.comment: elevation of the place where item is located (can be used as offset x from the center aka x,y,z=0,0,0)

comment: A tank that holds fluid, and can be emptied into a pipe
